people_also_ask.question: Are expandable hoses better than rubber?
people_also_ask.heading: If you've ever used a rubber hose, you've probably had problems with it kinking, knotting, or tangling. Expandable hoses kink far less than their rubber hose counterparts because the latex inside them is much more flexible than hard rubber. Expandable hoses, however, can still get tangled when you fill them with water.30-Jun-2021
